description: Try our easy to follow Self-Saucing Chocolate Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Self-Saucing Chocolate Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 190°C/170°C fan-forced. Grease a 6-cup baking dish and place on a large baking tray.
Place egg, butter, milk and vanilla in a medium bowl, whisking until combined.
Sift flour, baking powder and half of the cocoa in a large bowl. Stir in caster sugar. Add egg mixture, then stir to combine. Spoon batter into dish and smooth surface.
Combine brown sugar and remaining cocoa in a small bowl. Sprinkle evenly over batter. Carefully pour 1 cup boiling water over top of the mixture.
Bake for 40 minutes or until pudding springs back in centre when touched. Stand for 5 minutes. Serve topped with cream and raspberries.
